'''	BBQ Beef Heart Skewers''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for 	BBQ Beef Heart Skewers is obtainable from [[Cipac]] at the [[Stadium of the Sacred Flame]] for 2,500 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, BBQ Beef Heart Skewers restores '''40'''/'''50'''/'''60''' [[Stamina]] with a 300-second cooldown. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
